mdRecord.dcterms:title: Rock me to sleep Mother
Backward, turn backward, oh! time, in your flight
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Allen, Elizabeth Akers, 1832-1911 [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Civil War song sheet in 2 verses and 1 chorus; without music. Printed in black on illustrated letter paper, with verso of sheet ruled in blue. [original]
First line: "Backward, turn backward, oh! time, in your flight." [original]
Publication statement printed in one line. [original]
Charles Magnus published as an individual at 12 Frankfort St., New York, between 1860 and 1867. Works which also include Washington, D.C. imprint were published about 1863 and 1864. [original]

Hand-colored headpiece pictures a soldier holding a rifle with butt resting on the ground and barrel resting in the crook of his arm, the whole within a single rule border. Magnus 169b. Cf. American song sheets, 2019c. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: E647 .S63 no.1: Boxed with other Civil War song sheets. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: M1628.3 .C6 1861 no.15: Fifteenth of 25 song sheets which were mounted in an unidentified scrapbook. Rehoused, 2009. [original]
